content.rendered:
Leaders in material science and engineering, Arconic recognized exceptional employees in front of a global audience with a modern, elegant awards banquet at The Bridge Building.

The building's industrial vibe was complemented by a contemporary color palette of navy and gray with marble accents.

Our client didn't want to use too much color, so bright white florals in marble vases by LMA Designs added an elegant touch. Infinity's production team kept the vibe intimate yet minimal with modern string lighting.

Since top-notch service was crucial, we pulled out all the stops. With a full premium bar, table-side wine service, a specialty bourbon tasting bar and even gluten-free beer!

And because we never encourage drinking on an empty stomach, passed hors d'oeuvres were at the ready for cocktail hour upon arrival.

Hearty bites included crispy herbed risotto balls, margarita flatbread, candied bacon deviled eggs, shrimp and polenta, brisket tacos, and miniature chicken and waffles.

Afterwards, plated dinner was served. The meal began with artisan rolls with honey butter and pear and cranberry salads.

Entrées included bourbon glazed salmon, baseball cut sirloin and rigatoni primavera, ensuring there was something for everyone!

And for guests with any room left, Infinity's decadent flourless chocolate cake made mouths water and table-side coffee service rounded out the meal as the awards presentation began.

EVENT DETAILS

Date: October 11, 2018
Event: Arconic Awards Banquet
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 88
Theme: Modern
Photographer: Details Nashville
Florist: LMA Designs
Rentals: Music City Tents & Events
Bar & Catering: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Infinity Hospitality
Planning: Shannon | IH

excerpt.rendered: A modern & elegant awards banquet with lucite details at The Bridge Building.
